amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funding for Defense Health Programs by $1 million and reduces and then increases funding for RDTE by a similar amount in order to address suicide prevention studies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first reduce, then increase funding for Defense Health Program by $1 million and then reduce and increase funding for RDTE (suicide prevention) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Aguilar amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Aguilar amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Aguilar.
